channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report E-2024040464
item.description:
Report E-2024040464

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-24T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: HOOKSETT
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer material handler discovered two boxes on the bottom of a pallet stacked with 40 of the same boxes wet. Further investigation revealed that the two bottom boxes appeared to have been crushed by the weight of the boxes on top consequently contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed in a recovery container as was the two crushed boxes.

item.title: Report X-2024040894
item.description:
Report X-2024040894

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-22T15:11:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-12
  • City: WEST CHESTERFIELD
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: the package was in a bag on the back of the trailer it was on its side noticed it was leaking it looked like trash not a hazmat when the bag was open we saw the OP-900 the spill was cleaned up and the package was placed in a drum DescribePack: the cover was off one of the bottles it leaked through the box and into the bag leaked out of a small hole in bag DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: put in a salvage drum
